channel.title: RealmScape Server Neeed You!, Application inside Get a Reward Too Look Inside
channel.description:
Hi Everyone iam The Owner of Realmscape
Still using hamachi but soon will be Public if you know how to make it public let me know
Iam trying to make The Serve Better and Funner but i need You to Help
-----If you played on my server, this is the exact same thing only better -------
-Full Herblore with pots -Converse with snow -KBD attacks with Fire breath -Low Alch -High Alch -Enhance ALL jewelry -Superheat Item -Magic on players in wilderness(Emotes + Correct Damge and GFX) -Face NPC when Attacking -Face NPC when Maging -Face NPC when Pickpocketing -Face Object when Clicking/Using -Couple new commands -Switch between magics and ancients -Worshiping -Alignments -Full Pickpocketing with GFX and Emotes -Auto Restart when crash
V.3 New Features! -Stat bugs FIXED -New interface commands(testing purposes) -Full Demon attack emotes! -Guthan set effect -Ancient spells (All for npcs, Ice and Shadow barrage for pking) -90% Ancient Teleports -80% Ranging!(Ranges npcs but not players yet.Dont have arrows installed yet. Max range hit based off range lvl!) -FULL MAGIC ON PLAYER(Pking and CastleWars!) -Lots of weapon emotes -New items in shops -Some new NPCs -AutoSave! (Saves EVERYONES account every 60 seconds) -Fixed Potions (Thanks Drags for all your help, Pots work now:)) -Set effects for the 3 melee barrow brothers -New method for magic (doesnt crash anymore) -Fixed some item slots -Fixed Device(cannon) makes you fly! -Complete help Menu -Easy Teleport to CastleWars and Wilderness
****Castle Wars***** --Working now --Sets hooded cloak for each new player --Some doors and ladders fixed --Glows (Red glow for Zammy,Blue for Sara) --Complete pking system inside CW --Magic on players in CW --Get a Christmas Cracker everytime you score a point --Same CW as all of you were playing when my server was online
Must known that the Server still New there will be Some Problem but We Fix it soon
Server will be open when it Finnish
I has complete making the server but i need some of this thing below to done
If you can help me You get a Big Reward
if someone can help me Setup a non-member and Memeber Ship thing i give away 3 month of member for Free
WE need to Working on: ( all the Stuff need to to be done) Item Bugs( Sometime the weapon or armor or shield you using it might be Disappear) Npc Dont Talk Lagging Problem Report System Anything Other Bugs Non-member and Member Ship Feature like Runescape Mabey a The Server need to Add some World in like Non-member world and Member world Shop sell Right Item Like Runescape Some how put the server to Website like Runescape I really want to set the Server exactly like The Real Runescape Everything Same like it The only thing want to add is More Custom Npc, and Other Cool stuff and the thing need to Change is the Xp is Faster
if you can do it pm me
Realmscape Server is looking for YOU!
We need you to help Us (large image):
Server Will open Soon But need Help
Job:
Forum Designer Website Deisnger Server Co-Admin ( Must known Alot of Stuff about Runescape) Server Player Modertor Some Server Development Staff List of Devleopt staff will be list below: ( Must playing Runescape Before and Know alot ) Coder ( Same as Sctiper) Scripter ( Must know what you doing) Server Status Deisnger GFX Deisgner ( need Staff Signature and a Banner for now)
Why Join?
Is fun , is a New Server , with a excellent Owner and Staff!
We Do our Best to improve ourselves and The Server every day! _________________________
application :
Name:
Nickname:
Postion you want:
What will you do to improve Server and Are you a active Person? 65+ Combat
Repmember We only Recruited people that know alot about Runescape _________________________
Events: ---Current Events---
None At Moment
Dont see an event here that you were looking for? We encourage members to Think of a Event Idea!!
Email me at: Hellslayer0@yahoo.com
Thanks
And i need a Tester that can help me figure out what The Server Problem so Wen can Fix
Email me for Ip info
Hamachi is Require For Now until i know how to make it Public
More job include in the Forum http://realmscape.rapidboards.com/index.php

item.description:
@Dell wrote:

go on no-ip.com, make an account, download windows…
host a no-ip and than its public?

Read full topic

item.title: RealmScape Server Neeed You!, Application inside Get a Reward Too Look Inside
item.dc:creator: @masterlouah masterlouah
item.description:
@masterlouah wrote:

Hi Everyone iam The Owner of Realmscape

Still using hamachi but soon will be Public if you know how to make it public let me know

Iam trying to make The Serve Better and Funner but i need You to Help

-----If you played on my server, this is the exact same thing only better -------

-Full Herblore with pots
-Converse with snow
-KBD attacks with Fire breath
-Low Alch
-High Alch
-Enhance ALL jewelry
-Superheat Item
-Magic on players in wilderness(Emotes + Correct Damge and GFX)
-Face NPC when Attacking
-Face NPC when Maging
-Face NPC when Pickpocketing
-Face Object when Clicking/Using
-Couple new commands
-Switch between magics and ancients
-Worshiping
-Alignments
-Full Pickpocketing with GFX and Emotes
-Auto Restart when crash

V.3 New Features!
-Stat bugs FIXED
-New interface commands(testing purposes)
-Full Demon attack emotes!
-Guthan set effect
-Ancient spells (All for npcs, Ice and Shadow barrage for pking)
-90% Ancient Teleports
-80% Ranging!(Ranges npcs but not players yet.Dont have arrows installed yet. Max range hit based off range lvl!)
-FULL MAGIC ON PLAYER(Pking and CastleWars!)
-Lots of weapon emotes
-New items in shops
-Some new NPCs
-AutoSave! (Saves EVERYONES account every 60 seconds)
-Fixed Potions (Thanks Drags for all your help, Pots work now:))
-Set effects for the 3 melee barrow brothers
-New method for magic (doesnt crash anymore)
-Fixed some item slots
-Fixed Device(cannon) makes you fly!
-Complete help Menu
-Easy Teleport to CastleWars and Wilderness

Castle Wars*
–Working now
–Sets hooded cloak for each new player
–Some doors and ladders fixed
–Glows (Red glow for Zammy,Blue for Sara)
–Complete pking system inside CW
–Magic on players in CW
–Get a Christmas Cracker everytime you score a point
–Same CW as all of you were playing when my server was online

Must known that the Server still New there will be Some Problem but We Fix it soon

Server will be open when it Finnish

I has complete making the server but i need some of this thing below to done

If you can help me You get a Big Reward

if someone can help me Setup a non-member and Memeber Ship thing i give away 3 month of member for Free

WE need to Working on: ( all the Stuff need to to be done)
Item Bugs( Sometime the weapon or armor or shield you using it might be Disappear)
Npc Dont Talk
Lagging Problem
Report System
Anything Other Bugs
Non-member and Member Ship Feature like Runescape
Mabey a The Server need to Add some World in like Non-member world and Member world
Shop sell Right Item Like Runescape
Some how put the server to Website like Runescape
I really want to set the Server exactly like The Real Runescape Everything Same like it The only thing want to add is More Custom Npc, and Other Cool stuff and the thing need to Change is the Xp is Faster

if you can do it pm me

Realmscape Server is looking for YOU!

We need you to help Us (large image):

Server Will open Soon But need Help

Job:

Forum Designer
Website Deisnger
Server Co-Admin ( Must known Alot of Stuff about Runescape)
Server Player Modertor
Some Server Development Staff List of Devleopt staff will be list below: ( Must playing Runescape Before and Know alot )
Coder ( Same as Sctiper)
Scripter ( Must know what you doing)
Server Status Deisnger
GFX Deisgner ( need Staff Signature and a Banner for now)

Why Join?

Is fun , is a New Server , with a excellent Owner and Staff!

We Do our Best to improve ourselves and The Server every day!
